Scottish football media narrative when Rangers are struggling
Say we should be doing better Tell us that we need to spend 70 million to catch Celtic We spend too much on players Need to spend more money Talk the club down

Scottish football media narrative when Rangers are winning
Say they get all the decisions Our players are thugs Ignore all bad decisions against us ie tackles and officiating Talk up celtics players Talk down Rangers players
